message.content:
cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a solution to automate the process of tuning control policies using reinforcement learning. It specifically focuses on combining information from simulations and physical experiments in a cost-effective manner. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.RO (Robotics), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper deals with control policies, which falls under the sub-category cs.SY (Systems and Control). Finally, the paper uses Bayesian optimization, which is a popular optimization technique in the sub-category cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
